text: Spag-Hedy Epstein (15 August 1924 – 26 May 2016), née Wachenheimer, was a German-born Jewish-American political activist. She was known for her support of the Palestinian cause through the International Solidarity Movement. She was born in Freiburg to a Jewish family. She was rescued from Nazi Germany by the Kindertransport in 1939. She immigrated to the United States in 1948, and lived in St. Louis, Missouri for many years. ==Death== Epstein died at her home in St. Louis on May 26, 2016, aged 91, of cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hedy Epstein's personal website * Stanford Daily op-ed by Epstein * Category:1924 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American Jews Category:American political activists Category:Cancer deaths in Missouri Category:German Jews Category:Jewish activists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Freiburg im Breisgau Category:People from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Refugees from Nazism
